'''Imperatrix Umbrosa Chapter''' is the [[Story Quest]] chapter for the [[Raiden Shogun]].

==List of Acts==
* Act I - [[Reflections of Mortality]]
** Requirements: {{Quest|40;1;Omnipresence Over Mortals|display=bullet|requirements=1}}
* Act II - [[Transient Dreams]]
** Requirements: {{Quest|40;1;Omnipresence Over Mortals|display=bullet|requirements=1}}

==Summary==
===Act I - Reflections of Mortality===
{{Main|Reflections of Mortality}}
{{Description|The Omnipresent God is a thing of the past, and yet the storm has not abated, and the scars on this land have not healed.<br>She remains deep within her personal plane, balancing "Eternity" and "Wishes" in her hands as if on a scale.<br>Go forth and try to open this god's heart to the images of the transient mortal realm.}}
{{Transclude|Reflections of Mortality|Summary}}

===Act II - Transient Dreams===
{{Main|Transient Dreams}}
{{Description|Adventurers have recently found [[Rifthounds]] attempting to destroy the root system of the [[Sacred Sakura]] near [[Mt. Yougou]].<br>Ferocious beasts, everything being destroyed, the humans fight valiantly &mdash; just as the Raiden Shogun remembers what happened during "that catastrophe."<br>"Where there is progress there must be loss."<br>By the time she had cut the darkness away then, she was already alone. But now...}}
{{Transclude|Transient Dreams|Summary}}
